resources.string: The sun is one of the rare sources for vitamin D3, which is essential for health. It is produced by the body if sunlight reaches skin.
The sunlight can lead to sunburn on the skin, which is prevented when using suncream. Furthermore the sun can damage human eyes, when no sunglasses are used.
The UV-Radiation is part of the sunlight. The Uv-Index has range from 0 (very low) to 11 (too high).
Under some circumstances pv-panels may produce a conciderable amount of solar energy. 1 kwh equals 77 full charges of a smartphohne.
While the sun is above 35Â° it shins more effective. There will be direct radiation towards skin, pv-panels etc.
